step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your arms in front of your chest and fists closed. Try to tighten your muscles a bit more during this inhale phase.
Your arms extended well to shoulder height. Focus on a more relaxed exhale and muscle release as you open your fingers.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to fully open your fingers and relax your muscles as you exhale and extend your arms. Keep up the good work!
